trans-unit.source: Provides methods for passing credentials across a stream and requesting or performing authentication for client-server applications.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder for sending av legitimasjon i en dataflyt og ber om, eller utfører godkjenning for klient-server-programmer.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides methods and properties that are common to authenticated streams.
trans-unit.target: Denne abstrakte klassen inneholder metoder og egenskaper som er felles for godkjente dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: Authenticated streams can provide authentication, data signing, and encryption services that can help maintain the integrity and confidentiality of data transmitted using the <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream.InnerStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Godkjente flyter kan gi godkjenning data logger og kryptering av tjenestene som å vedlikeholde integritet og konfidensiell med data som overføres ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream.InnerStream%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream.InnerStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The security protocol implemented by a class that derives from AuthenticatedStream together with the security protocols supported on the client and server will determine the security features that are available to an application.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsprotokollen implementeres av en klasse som er avledet fra AuthenticatedStream sammen med sikkerhetsprotokollene som støttes på klienten og serveren bestemmer sikkerhetsfunksjonene som er tilgjengelig for en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> classes inherit from AuthenticatedStream and implement the Negotiate and Secure Sockets Layer security protocols, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>og <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>klasser arve fra AuthenticatedStream og implementere forhandle og Secure Sockets Layer security protokollene, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir `true` for den `leaveStreamOpen` parameteren lukking av <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>har ingen innvirkning på den `innerStream` dataflyten.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided for implementers of authenticated streams, and can be called only by classes that are derived from <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, er angitt for implementers med godkjente strømmer og kan bare kalles av klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether closing this <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> object also closes `innerStream`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om lukker dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> objektet lukker også `innerStream`.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: innerStream is .
trans-unit.target: innerStreamis .

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is equal to .
trans-unit.target: - eller - innerStream er lik .

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>referanser.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stream used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataflyten brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream> can use this property to access the stream passed to the <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>kan bruke denne egenskapen for å få tilgang til den angitte strømmen til <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether authentication was successful.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om godkjenningen var vellykket.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The methods called to perform authentication are defined in the classes that inherit from <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>.
trans-unit.target: Metoder for å utføre godkjenning er definert i klassene som arver fra <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det oppstod en vellykket godkjenning; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether data sent using this <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dataene sendt ved hjelp av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> er kryptert.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data; namely, it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: Kryptering bidrar til å beskytte personvernet for dataene. som, hjelper det for å sikre at dataene er i transitt, den ikke kan tydes av tredjeparter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data er kryptert før overføres via nettverket og dekrypteres når den når det eksterne endepunktet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether both server and client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om både serveren og klientprogrammene er godkjent.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Not all security protocols support mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle sikkerhetsprotokoller støtter gjensidig godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether mutual authentication is supported by the security protocol implemented in a class that inherits from <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>, check the class documentation.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut om gjensidig godkjenning støttes av sikkerhetsprotokollen implementert i klassen som arver fra <xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>, se dokumentasjonen for klassen.</xref:System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client and server have been authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis klienten og serveren har godkjent; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den lokale siden av tilkoblingen ble godkjent som serveren.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Most security protocols used for client-server authentication define specific behavior and requirements for supplying credentials for authentication based on whether you are the client or the server.
trans-unit.target: De fleste sikkerhetsprotokollene som brukes for klienten servergodkjenning Definer bestemte virkemåte og krav for å oppgi legitimasjon for godkjenning basert på om du er klienten eller serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the local endpoint was authenticated as the server side of a client-server authenticated connection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the local endpoint was authenticated as the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det lokale sluttpunktet ble godkjent som serversiden av en klient-godkjent servertilkobling; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis det lokale sluttpunktet ble godkjent som klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dataene som sendes ved hjelp av denne dataflyten er signert.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data; namely, it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: Data logger bidrar til å beskytte dataene. som, hjelper det mottakeren bestemme om dataene har blitt endret i transitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene er signert før overføres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the stream used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data has been left open.
trans-unit.target: Henter om dataflyten brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data er fortsatt åpen.

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the stream passed to the constructor of this class will not be closed after the instance of this class is closed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger `true`, dataflyten sendes til konstruktøren av denne klassen vil ikke bli lukket etter at forekomsten av denne klassen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, closing the instance of this class will also close the underlined transport stream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger `false`, lukker forekomsten av denne klassen, lukkes også understreket transportdataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the inner stream has been left open; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis indre dataflyten har vært åpen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
